description: Create Individual Benefits summary test data response

employments.description: An unordered list of one or more employments for which the taxpayer reported any benefits for the given tax year

companyCarsAndVansBenefit.description: The total value of company cars and vans.

fuelForCompanyCarsAndVansBenefit.description: The total value of fuel for company cars and vans.

privateMedicalDentalInsurance.description: The total value of private medical and dental treatment and insurance.

vouchersCreditCardsExcessMileageAllowanc.description: The value of benefits in the form of vouchers, credit cards and excess mileage allowance.

goodsEtcProvidedByEmployer.description: The total value of goods and other assets provided by the employer.

accommodationProvidedByEmployer.description: The total value of accommodation provided by the employer.

otherBenefits.description: The total value of other benefits, including interest-free loans and loans below the HMRC official rates.

expensesPaymentsReceived.description: The value of expenses payments received and balancing charges.
